price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Reka abomekera umugore canke umwana ku Mana Allah bagume mw’irementanya ryabo bafyinata kw’isi, gushika igihe bahuye n’umusi wabo basezeraniwe guhanirwako[10].
arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
footnotes: [10] Ivyo bihano basezeraniwe, bakaba bashobora kubihabwa bakiri kw’isi, canke bakabihabwa mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, canke bakabihabwa mu buzima bwo kw’isi no mu bw’inyuma yo gupfa.

meta.transliteration: fadharhum yakhūḍū wayalʿabū ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumu alladhī yūʿadūna
